episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_0100:
Preparations for the winter party seem to be
coming along smoothly!
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_0200:
I can’t wait to see what sort of entertainment’s
planned this time.
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_0300:
Looks like Primarina’s excited for her first party,
too!
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_0400: You two sure became friends fast!
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_0500:
I’m glad I gave you that Egg, Lillie. Thanks for
raising her with such care!
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_0600:
No, thank YOU! I’m so grateful I got to meet such
a wonderful Pokémon!
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_0700:
My own Primarina seems happy to have someone
to sing with!
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_0800: They really do have beautiful voices...
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_0900: Yeah, it seems a waste for only us to hear them!
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_1000: Oh! I just had an idea!
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_1100:
Why don’t we put on a show at the winter party
with some music?
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_1200:
It’d be nice to sing and play music with our
Pokémon.
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_1400:
Let’s find more people to join us so we can really
liven things up!
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_1500:
Great idea! We can invite Pokémon with nice
singing voices like Primarina’s—and some folks
who can play an instrument.
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_1600:
Oh, right! Speaking of instruments, you play the
flute, right, Lillie?
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_1700:
It’s been a while since I’ve heard you play. I’d like
to again!
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_1900:
Ahaha! Sounds like both Primarina want to hear
you play, too!
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_2000: Eheheh... In that case, I’d better start practicing.
episode_event_winter_2024/4001_1001_2200: Let’s go find more members for our ensemble!
episode_event_winter_2024/6801_1031_0100:
We’ll perform our music
for everyone!
episode_event_winter_2024/6801_1001_0100:
Music sure is fun! I can feel all our emotions
coming together as we play!
episode_event_winter_2024/6801_1001_0200: Yeah! I’ll have to do my best as conductor!
episode_event_winter_2024/6801_1001_0300: Let’s make this the best performance ever!
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_0100:
Huh. So you’re puttin’ together an ensemble for
the winter party, eh?
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_0200: Is that why you’re wearin’ that getup?
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_0300: Yeah. I thought I’d start with a clear visual.
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_0500:
I can tell how much spirit you’re all putting
into this!
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_0600: S-so...does that mean you’ll join us?!
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_0700: Sorry, but we gotta say no.
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_0900:
Well, you seem to have a certain style of music
in mind...
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_1000:
and I get the feeling it won’t mesh too well
with ours.
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_1100:
Yeah, and we’re what you might call “stars,”
so if we join your gig, we might steal the show,
y’know?
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_1200: Musical fusions can be cool an’ all...
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_1300:
but I don’t think it’d work with what you’re going
for with this event.
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_1400: I see... You may be right.
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_1500: I’m real sorry. It was kind of you to ask.
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_1600: No, don’t apologize! Thanks for considering!
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_1700:
But what should we do now? Do we know anyone
else who’d wanna join?
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_1800: Want us to introduce you to some people?
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_1900:
Yeah, we know some sync pairs who share
your spirit!
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_2100: Got it. We’ll get rollin’ on that.
episode_event_winter_2024/4002_1001_2200:
And as for your performance...we’re lookin’
forward to it.
episode_event_winter_2024/4003_1001_0100:
Piers told us you were looking for people to join
your musical ensemble!
episode_event_winter_2024/4003_1001_0200: I’d love to! Please let me join!
episode_event_winter_2024/4003_1001_0300: Yeah, let’s make some amazing music together!
episode_event_winter_2024/4003_1001_0400: Of course! It’ll be great to have you!
episode_event_winter_2024/4003_1001_0500: So you’re the ones who share our “spirit,” huh?
episode_event_winter_2024/4003_1001_0600: This should be plenty of people for our ensemble!
episode_event_winter_2024/4003_1001_0700: So let’s get right down to practi—
episode_event_winter_2024/4003_1001_0900: A Pokémon cry? Or was it an instrument?
episode_event_winter_2024/4004_1001_0100: The melody was coming from over here.
episode_event_winter_2024/4004_1001_0300: Great job, Kricketune! Just like that!
episode_event_winter_2024/4004_1001_0400: Now let’s try something more playful.
episode_event_winter_2024/4004_1001_0500: So it was Kricketune making that lovely melody!
episode_event_winter_2024/4005_1001_0100:
That was fantastic! Just like a Vespiquen
controlling her Combee!
episode_event_winter_2024/4005_1001_0200:
Kricketune is adjusting his melody based on your
movements. It’s clear you trust each other, or you
wouldn’t be able to pull that off!
episode_event_winter_2024/4005_1001_0400: Isn’t that nice to hear, Kricketune?
episode_event_winter_2024/4005_1001_0500: So it was Kricketune making that lovely sound!
episode_event_winter_2024/4005_1001_0700:
Lillie? And all the rest of you, too. What are you
doing here?
episode_event_winter_2024/4005_1001_0800: Actually, Bugsy...would you be our conductor?!
episode_event_winter_2024/4005_1001_0900:
Huh? Me? A conductor?! What’s this about, all of
a sudden.
episode_event_winter_2024/4005_1001_1000:
We’re putting together a music group to perform
at the winter party.
episode_event_winter_2024/4005_1001_1100:
And when I heard you and Kricketune performing
just now, I had to ask!
episode_event_winter_2024/4005_1001_1300:
B-but we were just playing around. We’re not
experts or anything.
episode_event_winter_2024/4005_1001_1500:
This is an opportunity to show everyone how great
Kricketune is!
episode_event_winter_2024/4005_1001_1600:
Besides, they approached you just to say how
much they enjoyed your and Kricketune’s
performance. Right?
episode_event_winter_2024/4005_1001_1900:
I’m not sure how well I’ll do, but I’ll be your
conductor!
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1101_0100:
With the help of Bugsy’s conducting, Lillie and the
others began practicing for their performance.
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_0200:
Our harmonies are really coming together thanks
to your conducting, Bugsy!
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_0300:
That’s right! And it seems Primarina and the others
find our music easy to sing along to!
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_0400: Our conductor sure looks the part, too!
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_0500: At this rate, I’m sure our performance will—
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_0700:
Your melody was completely different from when
you were performing alone.
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_0800: Let’s practice once more! From the top!
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_0900:
Oh, I get it! You’re changing your melody to match
the sounds around you!
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_1000:
Um...Bugsy? Would you mind conducting for us,
please?
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_1100:
Oh, sorry! I was so wrapped up in what
Kricketune was doing.
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1101_1300: They continued to rehearse for a bit, but...
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_1500:
(Kricketune sure plays a lot of different melodies
for me.)
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_1600:
(If we grow even closer, I bet I’ll hear
even more—)
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_1900:
I got totally absorbed listening to Kricketune’s
playing...
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_2000:
Hee hee! You really love Kricketune, don’t you,
Bugsy.
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_2100:
Yeah, you’ve been watching Kricketune the whole
time we’ve been practicing!
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_2200: Why don’t we take a break?
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_2300:
Yeah, we’ll tire ourselves out if we keep
practicing forever.
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_2500:
(The rehearsal’s come to a standstill because
of me.)
episode_event_winter_2024/4006_1001_2600: (At this rate, I’ll be no good as a conductor.)
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_0600: Was there a problem with our performance?
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_0700: No, not at all. You’ve done nothing wrong.
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_0800:
I’m actually worried about how I act around
Kricketune.
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_0900: What? But you get along so well!
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_1400:
I love Kricketune so much, I keep getting
distracted by him.
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_1500:
That’s why the rehearsal ground to a halt earlier.
I keep causing problems for everyone.
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_1700:
And it wouldn’t be good for Kricketune if I spoiled
him too much.
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_1800:
I think I should put some distance between us,
before I end up hurting Kricketune.
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_2000:
This is just my opinion, but I think things are
just fine.
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_2200:
It’s kind of you to think of what’s best for
Kricketune.
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_2300:
But as long as you can spend time with him and
spoil him, you should!
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_2400: At least, that’s what I think!
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_2600:
Besides, Pokémon are stronger than we give them
credit for!
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_2800: If you really love your Pokémon, then show it!
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_2900: No need to suppress that affection!
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_3100: Thanks, both of you. That’s a relief to hear.
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_3200:
To tell you the truth, I want to become even closer
friends with Kricketune!
episode_event_winter_2024/4007_1001_3400:
Let’s put all that aside for now...and concentrate
on this rehearsal!
episode_event_winter_2024/4008_1001_0100: Sorry I kept you all waiting!
episode_event_winter_2024/4008_1101_0200:
And so Bugsy and the others resumed their
practice.
episode_event_winter_2024/4008_1001_0400:
Think about how best to draw out Kricketune’s
strengths!
episode_event_winter_2024/4008_1001_0500: (How to draw out his... Oh, I know!)
episode_event_winter_2024/4008_1001_0600:
(Kricketune changes his melody based on others’
music around him!)
episode_event_winter_2024/4008_1001_0700:
(What if I got everyone to sing even better?
But how can I do that?)
episode_event_winter_2024/4008_1001_0800:
Hey, you two Primarina! Try singing with fuller
voices! Imagine you’re puffed up like a balloon!
episode_event_winter_2024/4008_1001_1200:
Practicing over and over like that really helped us
pull this together!
episode_event_winter_2024/4008_1001_1300: Yeah! Let’s go all out at the real performance, too!
episode_event_winter_2024/4009_1001_0300: A little... What about you, Lillie?
episode_event_winter_2024/4009_1001_0700: Let’s put on the best performance we can!
episode_event_winter_2024/4009_1001_0800: Yes! And as conductor, I’ll lead everyone!
episode_event_winter_2024/4009_1001_0900: OK, let’s go! We’re gonna give the gift of music!
episode_event_winter_2024/4010_1001_0400:
(This part should sound like the flutter of Ribombee
gathering honey in a field of flowers.)
episode_event_winter_2024/4010_1001_0500:
(But then this next little passage is sharp, like a 
Scyther’s slash.)
episode_event_winter_2024/4010_1001_0600:
(I can sense what Bugsy’s picturing through his
conducting.)
episode_event_winter_2024/4010_1001_0700: (Like this part: firm and bold like a Heracross!)
episode_event_winter_2024/4010_1001_0800:
(All of our notes coming together to form one
sound... This must be what music’s all about!)
episode_event_winter_2024/4011_1001_0100: This is great. I can tell they’re having fun.
episode_event_winter_2024/4011_1001_0200:
Yeah! It’s different from our music, with its own
kind of charm!
episode_event_winter_2024/4011_1001_0300: What a spirited sound. It warms the heart!
episode_event_winter_2024/4011_1001_0400: They sound great. I bet they practiced a lot.
episode_event_winter_2024/4011_1001_0500:
Why don’t you learn from them and practice the
flute yourself, Adaman?
episode_event_winter_2024/4011_1001_0600: Nah, I’ll pass. I don’t have the talent for the flute.
episode_event_winter_2024/4011_1001_0700: But I gotta say...this music really takes me back.
episode_event_winter_2024/4011_1001_0800: Yes... It makes me think of the vast land of Hisui.
episode_event_winter_2024/4011_1001_0900:
It just goes to show some things never change,
no matter how much time passes.
episode_event_winter_2024/4012_1001_0100:
Hey, everyone! Great job! That performance was
perfect!
episode_event_winter_2024/4012_1001_0200:
You all had such wonderful expressions. I got
some fantastic photos!
episode_event_winter_2024/4012_1001_0400:
Thanks to you, I’m sure everyone got to see just
how wonderful bug Pokémon are!
episode_event_winter_2024/4012_1001_0500:
And I’m a huge bug Pokémon fan myself, so that
makes me happy! Thank you!
episode_event_winter_2024/4012_1001_0600:
Oh—but I was only able to do it because of your
support, Aaron!
episode_event_winter_2024/4012_1001_0700:
And because Lillie invited me in the first place!
Plus, everyone worked so hard together!
episode_event_winter_2024/4012_1001_0800: So I’d like to thank you all!
episode_event_winter_2024/4012_1001_0900: Oh, no, no! I’m the one who should be grateful!
episode_event_winter_2024/4012_1001_1000:
It was just something I thought up on a whim, but
you were all kind enough to join me. I can’t thank
everyone enough!
episode_event_winter_2024/4012_1001_1200:
But more importantly, come on! We’re gonna take
a group photo!
episode_event_winter_2024/4012_1001_1300: There’s no way I’m missing a photo op like this!
